selinko dayabitis sentar bara kalamanakarana sayanayak aarambha karayi.ema wadasatahanata rudhiraye sini parikshawa eesiji saha kardiyoloji warthawak, waidya upades, wyayama wadasatahanak saha ema wyayama praguna kirima sandaha wu thawath sasi dekak athulath weyi.ema wadasatahana, madhyasthanaye sirure bara kalamanakaranaya sandaha wu sayanaye pawathwanu labayi.sayanayata paminena ayata wyayama pilibandawa nirupanayak saha bara kalamanakaranayata sambandha anek karunu pilibandawa upades laba deyi.me sayanayata wyayama praguna kirima sandaha wu amathara wyayam sasi dekak athulath weyi.selinko dayabitis sentar hi jyeshta waidya niladharini waidya charuki wirasuriya mahathmiya pawasuwe bara kalamanakarana sewa sapayana wyayama shala saha anek wada satahan kothekuth athath bara kalamanakarana wadasatahan waidya sudusukam athi ayeku wisin meheyawiya yuthu bawata madhyasthanaya wishwasa karana bawayi.
